item.title: Real estate tycoon Barbara Corcoran sells her palatial $13.5 million New York penthouse in one day
item.description: “Shark Tank” star Barbara Corcoran has sold her iconic New York City apartment—for $1.5 million over her original asking price.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
